data.current_summary: Create or replace deal splits for deals with the provided IDs. Deal split percentages for each deal must sum up to 1.0 (100%) and may have up to 8 decimal places
data.summary_suggestion: Batch create or update deal splits with validation
data.description_suggestion: Creates or replaces deal split records for multiple deals in a single batch operation. Each deal's split percentages must sum to exactly 1.0 (100%) with up to 8 decimal places of precision. Accepts a batch of deal IDs with their associated split configurations. Returns a batch response containing successfully created/updated deal splits and any errors encountered. Partial batch failures are possible (HTTP 207 response) - some deals may succeed while others fail validation or processing.

data.current_summary: Read a batch of deal split objects by their associated deal object internal ID
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve deal splits for multiple deals
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves deal split records for multiple deals in a single batch operation. Accepts a batch of deal object IDs and returns the associated deal split configurations for each deal. Returns a batch response containing deal splits for successfully retrieved deals and any errors encountered for deals that could not be found or processed. Partial batch failures are possible (HTTP 207 response) - some deals may succeed while others may not exist or encounter processing errors.
